task: Learn the UK and US pronunciation of the word "procrastination", and find one example sentence that reflects its use in context.
Learn the UK and US pronunciation of the word "procrastination", and find one example sentence that reflects its use in context.
user_action: type "procrastination" into the search bar with the placeholder "Search English–Korean" and press Enter to find the pronunciation and example sentence.
observation:
The search for "procrastination" on the Cambridge Dictionary site has provided both UK and US pronunciations. UK pronunciation is /prəˌkræs.tɪˈneɪ.ʃən/, and US pronunciation is /proʊˌkræs.tɪˈneɪ.ʃən/. 

An example sentence is: "Vacillation and procrastination, out of fears of recession or otherwise, would run grave risks." The task of learning the pronunciation and finding a contextual example has been completed successfully.
